DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether acetazolamide effective reduce length mechanical ventilation decompensated Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) patient develop pure mixed metabolic alkalosis .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Acetazolamide Reversal Metabolic Alkalosis Mechanically Ventilated Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether acetazolamide effective reduce length mechanical ventilation decompensated COPD patient develop pure mixed metabolic alkalosis .
DOC.criteria: Decompensated COPD invasive mechanical ventilation Less 24 hour
